client_complaints.description: Slow response time for IT support requests. Average response time is 4 hours instead of promised 2 hours.
client_complaints.remarks: Client is a premium customer, requires immediate attention

client_complaints.description: Incorrect billing for maintenance services. Charged for services not provided.
client_complaints.remarks: Billing department to investigate and correct charges

client_complaints.description: HVAC system not working properly in office area. Temperature control issues affecting productivity.
client_complaints.remarks: HVAC system repaired and functioning normally

staff_complaints.description: Insufficient lighting in workspace causing eye strain and reduced productivity.
staff_complaints.remarks: Lighting assessment scheduled for next week

staff_complaints.description: Printer malfunctioning frequently, causing delays in document processing.

client_complaint_resolutions.resolution_description: Implemented additional IT support staff and improved ticketing system to reduce response time to 1.5 hours.
client_complaint_resolutions.remarks: Client satisfied with improved response time

client_complaint_resolutions.resolution_description: Replaced faulty thermostat and repaired HVAC system. System now functioning at optimal levels.

staff_complaint_resolutions.resolution_description: Installed additional LED lighting fixtures and adjusted workspace layout for better illumination.
staff_complaint_resolutions.remarks: Staff member satisfied with improved lighting

escalation_tracking.description: Escalated due to premium client status and repeated complaints about response time.
escalation_tracking.remarks: Escalation led to immediate action and resolution

escalation_tracking.description: Escalated due to billing accuracy concerns and potential financial impact.

root_cause_analysis.root_cause: Insufficient IT support staff during peak hours and outdated ticketing system causing delays.
root_cause_analysis.corrective_action: Hired additional IT support staff and implemented new ticketing system with automated prioritization.
root_cause_analysis.remarks: Significant improvement in response times observed

root_cause_analysis.root_cause: Aging HVAC system with outdated thermostat and lack of preventive maintenance.
root_cause_analysis.corrective_action: Replaced thermostat, implemented preventive maintenance schedule, and upgraded HVAC monitoring system.
root_cause_analysis.remarks: HVAC system now operating efficiently with monitoring in place

root_cause_analysis.root_cause: Inadequate lighting design in workspace and lack of ergonomic assessment.
root_cause_analysis.corrective_action: Conducted lighting assessment, installed additional fixtures, and implemented ergonomic workspace guidelines.
root_cause_analysis.remarks: Improved lighting and ergonomic conditions for staff
